desc.cn: TinTin++（又称 tt++）是一款免费的 MUD 客户端，支持 Android、iOS、Linux、Mac OS X 和 Windows。
desc.en: TinTin++ (aka tt++) is a free Mud client for Android, iOS, Linux, Mac OS X and Windows.

alpine/apk.cmd:
mkdir tintin && \
cd tintin && \
apk update && \
apk upgrade && \
apk add build-base && \
apk add zlib-dev && \
apk add gnutls-dev && \
apk add pcre-dev && \
apk add make && \
apk add wget && \
wget https://github.com/scandum/tintin/releases/download/2.02.42/tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
tar -zxvf tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
cd tt/src && \
./configure && \
make install

openbsd/pkg_add.cmd:
pkg_add pcre && \
wget https://github.com/scandum/tintin/releases/download/2.02.42/tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
tar -zxvf tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
cd tt/src && \
./configure CFLAGS=-I/usr/local/include LDFLAGS=-L/usr/local/lib && \
make CFLAGS=-I/usr/local/include LDFLAGS=-L/usr/local/lib && \
make install

debian/apt.cmd:
mkdir tintin && \
cd tintin && \
sudo apt-get install build-essential && \
sudo apt-get install zlib1g-dev && \
sudo apt-get install libpcre++-dev && \
wget https://github.com/scandum/tintin/releases/download/2.02.42/tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
tar -zxvf tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
cd tt/src && \
./configure && \
sudo make install

fedora/yum.cmd:
mkdir tintin && \
cd tintin && \
sudo yum install make && \
sudo yum install gcc && \
sudo yum install zlib-devel && \
sudo yum install pcre-devel && \
wget https://github.com/scandum/tintin/releases/download/2.02.42/tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
tar -zxvf tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
cd tt/src && \
./configure && \
sudo make install

ubuntu/apt.cmd:
mkdir tintin && \
cd tintin && \
sudo apt-get update && \
sudo apt-get install build-essential && \
sudo apt-get build-dep tintin++ && \
wget https://github.com/scandum/tintin/releases/download/2.02.42/tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
tar -zxvf tintin-2.02.42.tar.gz && \
cd tt/src && \
./configure && \
sudo make install
